Node.Description: Go to Accounts payable > Purchase orders > All purchase orders.
In the Vendor account field, enter or select a value.
In the list, click the link in the selected row.
In the list, mark the selected row.
In the Item number field, enter or select a value.
In the list, click the link in the selected row.
In the Site field, enter or select a value.
In the list, click the link in the selected row.
In the Quantity field, enter a number.
Enter a filter value of "00000125" on the "Purchase order" field using the "begins with" filter operator.

CommandArgument.Value: Enter a filter value of "00000125" on the "Purchase order" field using the "begins with" filter operator.
